definitions: the movement of troops or equipment to a place or position for military action

examples.text: the authorities announced deployment of extra security forces in towns and cities to prevent violence
they agreed to round up their troops for immediate deployment
a six-month deployment in the Gulf with the U.S. Navy

shortDefinitions: movement of troops to place or position for military action

definitions: the action of bringing resources into effective action

examples.text: the rapid deployment of high-speed cable internet services to consumers
a world leader in the development and deployment of wave and tidal power

shortDefinitions: action of bringing resources into effective action
